achievement_bank.title: Decoupled desktop client from direct DB dependency
achievement_bank.action: Replaced tightly coupled EXE behavior with API-driven React web workflows and explicit REST boundaries.
achievement_bank.impact: Improved observability, reduced coupling, and materially improved production stability.

achievement_bank.title: Unified fragmented product surfaces into a reusable platform
achievement_bank.context: Website builder + booking + payment + mobile delivery
achievement_bank.action: Standardized booking flows, centralized payment logic, and moved change delivery to one platform.
achievement_bank.impact: Reduced code duplication and maintenance overhead while improving release consistency.

achievement_bank.title: Delivered Android + iOS within one week for government timeline
achievement_bank.context: AWTAR/KSRTC delivery constraints with late iOS requirement
achievement_bank.action: Used a React Native WebView strategy instead of full native rebuild.
achievement_bank.impact: Met contractual deadlines without schedule extension and established a reusable pattern.

achievement_bank.title: Owned delivery workflow from planning through release
achievement_bank.action: Led work breakdown, code reviews, and iterative release cycles with cross-team coordination.
achievement_bank.impact: Improved predictability and quality of ongoing delivery.

achievement_bank.title: Maintained production deployments on AWS-hosted Apache stack
achievement_bank.action: Handled deployment and maintenance on EC2 with static/media delivery via S3.
achievement_bank.impact: Supported reliable production delivery across multiple modules.
